responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! How can I help?

patterns: What is the syllabus for this course?
How can I enroll in a course?
responses: We offer a variety of courses, including Computer Science, Mathematics, and Literature. Would you like to know more about a specific course?
You can check the available courses on our website. Let me know if you'd like information on a specific one.
I can help you find the course you're looking for. Please let me know what you're interested in.
Our courses cover many topics. What specific course are you looking for?

patterns: When is the exam for this course?
responses: The exam schedule will be posted soon. You can check it on your student portal or feel free to ask me about specific dates!
Exams are usually held towards the end of the semester. Please check the official schedule or I can help with specific exam dates.
The exam schedule for the semester will be announced shortly. Stay tuned!

patterns: How much does the course cost?
What are the fees for this course?
Can you tell me about the fee structure?
How do I pay for the course?
responses: The fee structure depends on the course. Would you like details about a specific course?
The course fee can vary. Please check the fees section on our website for more detailed information.
You can find the fee structure on the official course page. Would you like to know about any specific course fees?
